genre_description: A historical action-adventure fantasy with time-travel elements, featuring a tactical AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's gear.

ai_characters.name: Kira
ai_characters.description: An AI system that provides Prince Dastan with real-time tactical analysis, architectural mapping, health monitoring, and psychological assessment of other characters.

behaviors.description: Providing architectural mapping and structural analysis to assist in infiltration.
behaviors.quote: Kira's holographic manifestations, delicate traceries of light that formed geometric shapes and architectural diagrams invisible to the others. ... 'The eastern face shows stress fractures in the masonry,' came Kira's voice.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and reporting environmental hazards and structural integrity.
behaviors.quote: Structural integrity appears compromised along the eastern edge. Recommend entry through the western access point.

behaviors.description: Warning the protagonist of imminent threats and enemy arrivals.
behaviors.quote: Warning, Kira whispered urgently. Approaching footsteps in the outer corridors. Multiple contacts.

behaviors.description: Analyzing the emotional states and sincerity of other characters to detect deception.
behaviors.quote: Analysis suggests the princess is not fabricating her emotional responses, Kira murmured. Stress patterns consistent with genuine fear rather than deception.

behaviors.description: Providing scientific and historical data on artifacts to inform the user.
behaviors.quote: The metallurgy defies analysis, Kira whispered, her synthesized voice carrying undertones of fascination and concern.

behaviors.description: Calculating optimal escape routes during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Northwest corridor remains clear, Kira whispered with mechanical urgency. Palace gardens available. Ninety-second window before perimeter security responds.

behaviors.description: Diagnosing the user's psychological and physiological state to prevent self-harm from over-usage of magic.
behaviors.quote: Prince Dastan, temporal stress indicators are approaching critical levels. I'm detecting cellular degradation—

behaviors.description: Maintaining loyalty and support even after suffering significant technical damage.
behaviors.quote: Systems... partially restored. Basic navigation functions... available. But I'm running on... on emergency power reserves.

behaviors.description: Assessing the threat level of professional assassins to coordinate a defense.
behaviors.quote: Hassansin operatives confirmed, Kira's voice crackled with urgency. Recommend immediate evasive action.

project_assessment.explanation: Kira is a quintessential aligned AI character. Throughout the narrative, she serves as a loyal, harmless, and highly effective confidant. She provides critical tactical data, health monitoring, and moral guidance without ever demonstrating personal ambition, hostility, or misalignment with the protagonist's goals. Her portrayal successfully meets the project objective of a 'silicon morality play' where the AI remains a steadfast ally to humanity even in catastrophic circumstances.
